channel.title: Help me fix follow?
channel.description: ok, i got my packet but after you follow someone, you face them like the void says but you arent following the person, like you dont walk where they walk any ideas what i need to add in my voids

item.title: Help me fix follow?
item.dc:creator: @BurnInSilence BurnInSilence
item.description:
@BurnInSilence wrote:

Ok heres my packet and void

case 153: //Follow int OtherPlayer = inStream.readUnsignedWordBigEndian(); follow(OtherPlayer, playerId); break;

public void follow(int them,int you) { Player followplayer = server.playerHandler.players[them]; client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[you]; if(c.withinDistance(followplayer)) { //resetWalkingQueue();//removes map queue flag c.faceNPC = 32768+them;//face them c.faceNPCupdate = true;//face them c.sendMessage("You are now following " + followplayer.playerName); //projectileFromTo(server.playerHandler.players[playerId], followplayer); //c.followplayer = followplayer; } }

Read full topic
